environment_variables.PBS_O_WORKDIR: The working directory of the job
environment_variables.PBS_ARRAY_INDEX: The index of the current array task
environment_variables.logDir: The directory where the log files are stored
environment_variables.dataDir: The directory where the trimmed reads are stored
environment_variables.taskDir: The file containing the tasks for the array job
environment_variables.idx: The index of the current array task
environment_variables.read1: The name of the first read file
environment_variables.read2: The name of the second read file
environment_variables.outFile: The name of the output file
